news_header: Tommy Yinson, a British far-right activist, sentenced to 18 months in prison for inciting anti-Semitic riots.
news_text: Tommy Yinson, also known as Stephen Yaxley-Lennon, has received an 18-month prison sentence. His lawyer argued that Yinson discussed refugees in interviews and documentaries to defend his freedom of speech. He has been accused of inciting anti-Semitic riots.
